promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute mythical wolf fire-type pokemon wearing a red and white crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or wolf. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyroquartz, a a chibi cute mythical wolf fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Flare Blitz-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "wolf", "fire" or "Pyroquartz". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, wolf-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: This mythical creature, Pyroquartz, thrives in arid climes. Its Flare Blitz-GX lights up dust storms, and its radiant warmth cares for fellow desert dwellers.
